description.narrative: The project' development objective is to improve Rural Communes'capacity to design and implement in a participatory manner Communal Development Plans (CDP) and Annual Investment Plans (AIP) and therefore contributing to enhance rural livelihoods.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall ensure that interim unaudited financial reports for the Project are prepared and furnished to the World Banknot later than forty five days after the end of each calendar semester,
The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements for the Project audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 2.07 (b) ofthe Standard Conditions.
